byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED and ANDREW ROSS SORKIN

abstract: Robert Wolf firm 32 Advisors will announce it is spinning off drone-services business Measure into separate company; move is latest in series of big bets by investors on nascent drone industry, with drone start-ups attracting $107 million in funding in 2014; analysts estimate industry has potential to produce many billions of dollars in annual revenue.
lead_paragraph: Robert Wolf’s advisory firm plans to announce it is spinning off its drone-services arm into a separate company, which is positioned like none other to thrive in the nascent drone market.

headline.main: Drone-for-Hire Business Makes Big Bet on Industry
headline.print_headline: Drone-for-Hire Business Makes Big Bet on Industry

snippet: Robert Wolf’s advisory firm plans to announce it is spinning off its drone-services arm into a separate company, which is positioned like none other to thrive in the nascent drone market.
